rooms.name: Open Lounge & Dining Area
rooms.description: An expansive open-plan living space that merges lounge, dining, and kitchen areas. The design features Bohemian aesthetics with vibrant textiles and eclectic decor, ensuring adherence to Vastu principles by aligning the main entrance for positive energy flow.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: A luxurious master bedroom designed with bohemian touches such as decorative wall hangings and unique furniture. Placement ensures proper Vastu alignment by facing east to welcome morning light.

rooms.name: Bedroom 2
rooms.description: A comfortable secondary bedroom for family members, designed with a blend of modern and bohemian elements. Vastu considerations include placing the bed in the northeast corner to maximize auspicious energy.

rooms.name: Bedroom 3
rooms.description: Another well-appointed bedroom integrated within the open floor plan, maintaining a consistent bohemian aesthetic. The room is arranged with Vastu in mind by having the bed oriented towards the east.

rooms.name: Bedroom 4
rooms.description: Fourth bedroom tailored for additional family members or guests, featuring eclectic design elements and strategic placement for optimal energy flow as per Vastu guidelines.

rooms.name: Library
rooms.description: A dedicated library space offering a quiet retreat. The room is designed with ample natural light from strategically placed openings and incorporates bohemian decor to create a cozy ambiance.

rooms.name: Servant's Quarters
rooms.description: Functional living quarters for the household staff, designed with modest yet comfortable amenities. The layout ensures privacy and adheres to local building norms while incorporating natural lighting.

openings.name: Main Entrance
openings.description: The main entrance is designed to welcome positive energy in accordance with Vastu principles, ensuring a smooth transition from the external environment into the open-plan interior spaces.

openings.name: Windows
openings.description: Strategically placed windows allow natural light to flood the space while adhering to local building norms. The east-facing windows enhance morning energy as recommended by Vastu.

openings.name: Roof Terrace Access
openings.description: Provides access to a central courtyard area on the roof level, offering an open-air retreat that adheres to luxury design standards and Vastu principles by connecting indoor and outdoor spaces.

openings.name: Service Elevator
openings.description: Ensures accessibility for the servant's quarters while maintaining privacy and efficiency in movement, following local building norms.
